mapper.update: update t_sys_order set order_status = #{orderStatus}, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where order_id = #{orderId} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select a.order_id orderId, a.order_cus_id orderCusId, b.goods_id goodsId, b.goods_name goodsName, a.cnt goodsCnt, a.order_total_price orderPrice, b.price, b.sales_price salesPrice from t_sys_orderdetail a, t_sys_goodsInfo b where a.goods_id = b.goods_id and a.order_id = #{orderId} and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0
